SELECT MS_SI_MEISAI.MS_SI_MEISAI_ID,
MS_SI_MEISAI.MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID, MS_SI_MEISAI.MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID,
MS_SI_MEISAI.NAME, MS_SI_MEISAI.NYUURYOKU_NO, MS_SI_MEISAI.KASHIKARI_FLAG,
MS_SI_MEISAI.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_MEISAI.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_MEISAI.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_MEISAI.DATA_NO, MS_SI_MEISAI.USER_KEY, MS_SI_MEISAI.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_MEISAI.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_MEISAI.TS,
MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID, MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU.NAME AS HIYOU_KAMOKU_NAME, MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.NAME AS DAIKOUMOKU_NAME, MS_SI_KAMOKU.KAMOKU_NAME AS KAMOKU_NAME
FROM MS_SI_MEISAI
JOIN MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU ON MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID = MS_SI_MEISAI.MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID JOIN MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU ON MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID = MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU.MS_SI_HIYOU_KAMOKU_ID LEFT JOIN MS_SI_KAMOKU ON MS_SI_KAMOKU.MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID = MS_SI_MEISAI.MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID

INSERT INTO MS_SI_MEISAI( MS_SI_MEISAI_ID ,
MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID , MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID ,
NAME , NYUURYOKU_NO , KASHIKARI_FLAG ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_SI_MEISAI_ID') ,
:MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID , :MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID ,
:NAME , :NYUURYOKU_NO , :KASHIKARI_FLAG ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_MEISAI SET MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID = :MS_SI_DAIKOUMOKU_ID , MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID ,
NAME = :NAME , NYUURYOKU_NO = :NYUURYOKU_NO , KASHIKARI_FLAG = :KASHIKARI_FLAG ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_MEISAI_ID = :MS_SI_MEISAI_ID AND TS = :TS
